paper_metadata.title: MAIN TEXT
paper_metadata.extraction_summary: Extracted information on the KCNH2 variant Ser55Leu, including clinical significance, penetrance data, and individual records.

individual_records.evidence_sentence: A 27-year-old female was seen for long QT syndrome.

functional_data.summary: KCNH2 Ser55Leu is positioned at domains critical for KCNH2 fast inactivation.

variants.segregation_data: Yes, it segregates with disease in families.
variants.evidence_level: strong evidence based on clinical phenotyping and electrophysiologic study.
variants.additional_notes: The variant was correctly classified as pathogenic based on structural analysis.
key_quotes: KCNH2 Ser55Leu is correctly classified as pathogenic.

extraction_metadata.notes: All relevant data for the KCNH2 variant was extracted from the main text.
